content: I cannot predict the future or make assumptions, but i can provide insights based on current trends and market analysis. with streaming platforms producing content targeted at younger audiences like disney+, netflix, and amazon prime, there is a growing demand for youth-oriented programming. to compete in this space, discovery may need to adapt its content strategy and create more content designed to appeal to younger viewers. however, discovery has a long-standing reputation for producing high-quality documentaries, reality shows, and non-scripted content that appeal to a wide range of audiences. therefore, it might need to balance attracting younger audiences while still keeping its existing viewers engaged. by having a diverse range of content, discovery has the potential to compete and thrive in the ever-growing streaming and on-demand video market.
